page.layout_update_xml: <referenceContainer name="catalog.compare.sidebar" remove="1"/> <referenceContainer name="wishlist_sidebar" remove="1"/> <referenceContainer name="sidebar_custom" remove="1"/> <referenceContainer name="div.sidebar.additional"> <block class="Magento\Cms\Block\Block" name="sidebar_banner"> <arguments> <argument name="block_id" xsi:type="string">sidebar_banner</argument> </arguments> </block> <block class="Magento\Cms\Block\Block" name="sidebar_testimonials"> <arguments> <argument name="block_id" xsi:type="string">sidebar_testimonials</argument> </arguments> </block> <block class="Magento\Newsletter\Block\Subscribe" name="sidebar.subscribe" template="subscribe_sidebar.phtml"/> <block class="Magento\Cms\Block\Block" name="sidebar_facebook"> <arguments> <argument name="block_id" xsi:type="string">sidebar_facebook</argument> </arguments> </block> </referenceContainer> <referenceContainer name="columns"> <block class="Magento\Cms\Block\Block" name="ms_index_banners2_page2" after="main.columns.grid-row"> <arguments> <argument name="block_id" xsi:type="string">ms_index_banners2_page2</argument> </arguments> </block> </referenceContainer>

page.title: MyShop Home Page - 3
